title: Research and development expenditure : U.S. pharmaceutical industry 1995 to 2018
summary: This is a multi-line chart with 2 lines representing Total pharmaceutical industry , and PhRMA member companies. The y axis denotes Expenditure in billion USD and the x axis denotes Year.
Overall PhRMA member companies is rapidly increasing, Total pharmaceutical industry  is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
PhRMA member companies has increased by 5.2 times.
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. PhRMA member companies, and lastly, 2. Total pharmaceutical industry .

Throughout the period, PhRMA member companies generally had the highest Expenditure in billion USD relative to others with an average of 41.98, and it reached its maximum at 2018 with a value of 79.6.
The botommost line, Total pharmaceutical industry ,  has a mean of 17.32, and peaked at 2010.
